trans-unit.source: Represents a single [Target](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/350f6fc2-86b3-45f2-a31e-ece0e6bd4dca) element in an MSBuild project.

Adds the specified [Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d82e2485-e5f0-4936-a357-745bacccc299) element to the [Target](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/350f6fc2-86b3-45f2-a31e-ece0e6bd4dca) element.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask"></xref> object that represents the `Task` element to add to the `Target` element.
A object represents a child Task element of the Target element.
Gets the Condition attribute value of the [Target](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/350f6fc2-86b3-45f2-a31e-ece0e6bd4dca) element.
The Condition attribute value of the Target element.
Gets the DependsOnTargets attribute value of the [Target](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/350f6fc2-86b3-45f2-a31e-ece0e6bd4dca) element, which is a semicolon-separated list.
The DependsOnTargets attribute value of the Target element.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref>.

This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target>.
A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask> object represents a child element of the `Target` element.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref>.
Gets or sets the items that are to be input into this target.
Items inside this target attribute are used as the inputs in the top level dependency analysis.
A string representing the items.
Gets a value indicating whether the [Target](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/350f6fc2-86b3-45f2-a31e-ece0e6bd4dca) element was imported into the project.
`true` if the Target element was imported into the project; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the Name attribute value of the [Target](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/350f6fc2-86b3-45f2-a31e-ece0e6bd4dca) element.
The Name attribute value of the Target element.
Gets or sets the expected outputs of this target.
You can apply transforms to this target attribute to transform a set of input items into a set of output items.
This attribute is used not only for top level dependency analysis but also for the purposes of defining this targets outputs.
A string representing the outputs.

Removes the specified [Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d82e2485-e5f0-4936-a357-745bacccc299) element from the [Target](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/350f6fc2-86b3-45f2-a31e-ece0e6bd4dca) element.
A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask> object represents a child `Task` element of the `Target` element.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask"></xref> object that represents the `Task` element to remove from the `Target` element.
